author: Alemas
title: First to review here!
review:
The 2007 Power Racers had a cool function: when they crash, parts come off! This set does just that, and has cool pieces: two engines, and two aircraft engines!

Pros:

Pieces come off when crashed
Pull-back motor
"Butch" style
Big wheels

Cons:

You have to crash it pretty hard to make the pieces come off

Overall, a cool set!
